title: Restricted 1 hour before season ends
body: Thats frustrating! :P I kept playing flex,and premade guys were flaming then reporting me and now i got restricted,just an hour before i get my rewards.I dont believe thats actually fair,sicne in most of my games I was honored.Anyways,im not writing to complain,it was just a silly godlen thing that no one pays attention to.I just have to state that Riot must change the system that investigation players' behavior and I think most of the guys here will agree,becuase to not get reported you have to be lucky.In one of my games my enemies reported me while i couldnt even write in ALL chat (restricted).W/e good rewards to the unbanned comrades :)

This is a common argument, but it's not really true.

A desire to not be abused or insulted isn't a trait unique to kids. I've done competitive sports for 15-odd years, and, although I *do* put up with shit-talk, I much prefer environments where it doesn't happen. It's simply rude and unnecessary. Think of how many people, for example, would find a new coffee shop or bar if one of those venues allowed people to go around telling other patrons how worthless they are.

Riot wants a friendly, approachable community where you're comfortable relaxing and playing a few games for fun. Weirdly, most people don't WANT to be abused or insulted during their leisure time.

If that's not to your liking that's fine, and I encourage you to find another game better suited to your desired behaviors.

Well,i respect your opinion but we just disagree :) Harsh language must be tolerated till some point imo.We are people,not robots.The way you express yourself is a part of your personal temper and since it doesnt get personal its funny to get punished.w/e i got philosophical  there.Thanks for your time :D

Quite correct!  We players are humans, not robots.  We (the player base) do not want to be on the receiving end of toxic player's temper.  Whereas it would probably rolled off of the AI bot's backs if you "express yourself" to them ingame, we humans prefer not to tap into the range of emotions when we are insulted and harassed when we play this game to relax and have fun.

I gave you an up vote here, because I agree somewhat but not completely, and you seem like a very civil person in this thread (if not your chat logs.

I agree that people are not robots, that they are not all the same, and that you need to make room for them in your life. If I complained every time my brothers swore they would not visit me anymore, so I don't say anything about it and only cringe occassionally.

However there are certain baselines of behavior enforceable in certain settings. One example would be "order" in a courtroom setting, where only one person is speaking at a time. People making a scene or disturbing that "order" are removed.

In league insults are not accepted. You are not to say or imply negative things about persons, or deliberately decrease a persons enjoyment because it runs counter to the purpose of the business, which is to make people happy to stay in the environment and continue purchasing products and services.
